title: Can't find server Transfer
body:
Hi,
I recently transfered my account to Oceania server  from Brazil, but now im going to Brazil for Holidays and can't find the server transfer item, i go to the "account" session and the only thing that appears is Name change, anyone knows what is happening and how can i transfer ?

replies.body:
In preparation for end of season, server transfers have been disabled for a while. You can read more about it [HERE](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/eylRc8AL-important-notice-transfers-disabled-from-sep-14th-to-nov-21st). 
You have up until october 10th to request a manual transfer (which you can read about in the above link).
